import React, { useState } from 'react' import Balances from './Balances' import usdt from './usdt-logo.png' const Main = ({stakingBalance, tetherBalance, rwdBalance}) => { const [airdropTime, setAirdropTime] = useState(0); return (
{window.web3.utils.fromWei(tetherBalance, 'Ether')} Available
MAX
Airdrop {airdropTime}
) } export default Main
